experiences.title: AI & Data Science Project Developer
experiences.subtitle: Independent | Self-Initiated Projects & Open Source
workDescription: Developed and deployed 8+ real-world AI/ML projects covering computer vision, NLP, LLMs, and time-series forecasting.
Built full-stack solutions including an AI Research Agent (LangChain + OpenAI), CNN-based Wildfire Smoke Detector, and Text Summarization Pipeline using Transformers.
Designed and optimized end-to-end workflows with FastAPI, Docker, MLflow, and DVC for scalable, production-grade delivery.
Published high-quality GitHub repositories with code, architecture diagrams, and live demos to showcase applied skills.
Created custom API services (e.g., YFinance server) and contributed to projects referenced by real-world users and communities.
Continuously learning and applying cutting-edge AI concepts such as RAG, vector databases, embeddings, and LLM agent frameworks.
